H0.text: The Suricate is another name for which mammal. Meerkat-like Mongoose

H1.text: The Suricate is another name for which mammal. Ground Squirrel

H2.text: The Suricate is another name for which mammal. Prairie Dog

H3.text: The Suricate is another name for which mammal. Merkat

A4.text: The native South African name for the meerkat is suricate.

A5.text: The meerkat (Suricata suricatta) or suricate is a small mongoose found in southern Africa.
